# superEncoder()

**Instance Method**

Encodes a nested container and returns an `Encoder` instance for encoding `super` into that container.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func superEncoder() -> any Encoder
```

## Return Value

A new encoder to pass to `super.encode(to:)`.
title: superEncoder()
